newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Tianjin Zhongxin says IPO 8.4 times subscribed.
newsitem.headline: Tianjin Zhongxin says IPO 8.4 times subscribed.

text.p: Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corp Ltd (TZXP) said on Wednesday its initial public offer (IPO) of shares was 8.4 times subscribed.
It said in a statement its IPO subscription rate was based on 18.9 million shares offered to the public.
This was the amount available for subscription, it said.
Its public offer tranche comprised a total of 20 million shares and a placement tranche of 80 million shares at US$0.68 each.
"We are pleased with the good response to our invitation from the public," said Liu Zhen Wu, chairman of TZXP.
He said the strong response from institutional investors was a good indication of their belief in the future growth of the company. Its placement tranche has been fully subscribed.
TZXP is the first company from China to seek a primary listing on the SES.
DBS Bank if the lead manager of the IPO.
Balloting will be held on Thursday at the SES.
